description.description_one: My name is Felipe Frantz Zanini, a software engineer who currently operates as a frontend developer & tech lead. I'm passionate about jiu jitsu, independent game development, writing, art and music. I’m 30 years old and currently live in Dom Pedrito, Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil.
description.description_two: I started in the development world in 2008 when I began my technical education. In 2010, upon completing the program, I secured my first programming internship, and since then, I have never stopped studying and advancing. After being hired as a software engineer, at that time, I contributed to over 40 projects encompassing many technologies, with PHP being the standout.
description.description_three: Passionate about the field and committed to improvement, I earned a degree in Information Technology Management, along with a specialization in IT Strategic Planning. I also embarked on a Master's in Computer Science, which, due to personal reasons, I was unable to complete, despite consistently maintaining grades at levels A and B throughout the program and fulfilling all necessary credits for graduation.
description.description_four: I currently hold the position of Frontend Developer & Tech Lead specializing in web development at Nav9, where I have the opportunity to be a technology partner for many companies such as: Shoppings Iguatemi, UFC, NBA, EducaCross, Grupo SEB, Rede AZ, research groups, among others. Always assisting them create the best product solution for the web.
description.description_five: My goal is to create a completely independent game and document the entire process on my YouTube channel. To bring these game development and content projects to life, I have been investing time and energy in specializing in many areas, including scriptwriting, game design, level design, pixel art, color theory, as well as studying piano and music theory.

about_section.about_description: This website was developed using Next.js as a framework, deployed with Vercel, styled using Tailwind, and with icons powered by the library Radix UI. All text is set in the MavenPro typeface.

about_contact.contact_description_one: If you'd like to chat about building product, consulting or game development do get in touch at
